titleStmt.title: The life and death of the Reverend Mr. John Eliot, who was the first preacher of the Gospel to the Indians in America with an account of the wonderful success which the Gospel has had amongst the heathen in that part of the world, and of the many strange customs of the pagan Indians in New-England / written by Cotton Mather.
titleStmt.author: Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
